bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names fu dou chuang 麩豆瘡 , bran-beans sores. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of ma zhen 麻疹 , sesame papules, and dou zhen 痘疹 , smallpox papules. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry xi jiao 犀角：主風毒攻心，毷氉熱悶，擁毒赤痢，小兒 麩豆，風熱驚癇，並宜用之 , “It controls wind poison attacking the heart, with restlessness, heat and heart-pressure; it blocks poison and red free-flux illness, children’s bran-beans , as well as wind heat and fright epilepsy – for all these conditions its use is appropriate”.
